sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.main_customer_name ,main.main_customer_abbreviation ,main.contact_name ,main.contact_telephone ,main.introduction ,main.disp_seq ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM cmn_main_customer main LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
sql.getMainCustomers: SELECT main.uid ,main.main_customer_name FROM cmn_main_customer main WHERE main.record_status = 1 %s ORDER BY CONVERT(main.main_customer_name USING gbk) ASC LIMIT 20 -- 取符合条件的前20条
